articles.author: AP
articles.title: Russia makes last-minute bond payment to avoid default
articles.description: Russia has not defaulted on its foreign debts since the Bolshevik Revolution in 1917, when the collapse of the Russian Empire led to the creation of the Soviet Union.
articles.content:
Russia has staved off a default on its debt by making a last-minute payment using its precious dollar reserves sitting outside the country, US Treasury officials said.

articles.description: ब्रेक के बाद चीन की खिलाड़ी ने लगातार पांच अंक बनाकर 19-12 की बढ़त बनाकर मैच में 1-1 की बराबरी हासिल कर ली। निर्णायक गेम में दोनों खिलाड़ी 2-2 से बराबर थीं लेकिन सिंधु ने अपने क्रॉस-कोर्ट स्मैश से अंक जुटाए और ब्रेक तक 11-5 से आगे हो गईं।

articles.title: India remains trigger-happy on internet shutdowns
articles.description: By the end of the year, India was responsible for at least 106 such incidents, making it the worst offender on internet shutdowns for the fourth year in a row. India accounted for almost half (47%) of the 182 internet shutdowns worldwide in 2021.
